name: squaretouch
description:
have you ever wanted to speedrun, but don't feel like putting in any effort? so have i! that's why i have created squaretouch, one of the few speedrun games where you can do absolutely nothing and win! this is a loose recreation of the original Scratch game "light touches square".

how it works is: two squares move around the screen randomly. the goal is for them to touch 50 times. the game times how long it takes for this to happen, and also keeps track of your personal best and number of attempts!

the "r" key resets the current run. you can also press "a" to toggle "autoreset" mode, so you can even leave squaretouch running without having to manually reset! oh and press "escape" to pause.
